responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "73ACAEF341CB64CF9FEA6FB51BC52E1D", "Simple enough. I\'ll loan you a set of my basic gathering tools. Head out onto the mountainside, maybe go south a bit. Whatever you do though, stay out of the mountain itself - or even the old waterways; I hear the Ironshod Minotaur have holed up in there, them and their wild Ramkin. Stay outside, under the open sky. Bring me back a small bundle of useful goods, and the tools are yours for keeps. Fair tide, right? Proves you\'ve got what it takes, and it helps restock our holds!")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_HimaLuraki_5_Response
